scenarios.explanation_zh: A72 彩虹，無連接（7和2相差5，A與7相差7），無聽牌可能，屬於乾燥A高牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: A72 rainbow, no connectivity, no draw possibilities. Classic dry ace-high texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: A53 彩虹，雖然有輪子聽牌可能但牌面仍屬乾燥A高
scenarios.explanation_en: A53 rainbow, minor wheel draw but still classified as dry ace-high.

scenarios.explanation_zh: K83 彩虹，K高無連接牌面，屬於乾燥K高
scenarios.explanation_en: K83 rainbow, king-high with no connectivity. Classic dry king-high.

scenarios.explanation_zh: K94 彩虹，K高斷開牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: K94 rainbow, king-high disconnected board.

scenarios.explanation_zh: Q72 彩虹，Q高無連接，乾燥Q高牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: Q72 rainbow, queen-high disconnected. Dry queen-high texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: Q83 彩虹，Q高斷開牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: Q83 rainbow, queen-high with gaps.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 852 彩虹低牌，無高牌無連接，乾燥低牌彩虹
scenarios.explanation_en: 852 rainbow low cards. Dry low rainbow texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 942 彩虹，9高斷開，屬於乾燥低牌彩虹
scenarios.explanation_en: 942 rainbow, 9-high disconnected. Low rainbow texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: AA7 配對A，高對子牌面，極度有利進攻者
scenarios.explanation_en: AA7 paired aces. High paired board, heavily favors aggressor.

scenarios.explanation_zh: KK5 配對K，高對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: KK5 paired kings. High paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: QQ3 配對Q，高對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: QQ3 paired queens. High paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 559 配對5，低對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: 559 paired fives. Low paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 338 配對3，低對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: 338 paired threes. Low paired board.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 77T 配對7，低對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: 77T paired sevens. Low paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: KQJ 大牌連接，濕潤大牌牌面，有大量聽牌
scenarios.explanation_en: KQJ broadway connector. Very wet with many draws.

scenarios.explanation_zh: QJT 大牌三連張，濕潤大牌連接
scenarios.explanation_en: QJT three connected broadway. Wet broadway texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: AKQ 最高三連張，濕潤大牌牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: AKQ top broadway. Wet broadway texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: JT9 中間三連張，非常濕潤，多重聽牌
scenarios.explanation_en: JT9 middle connected. Very wet with straight possibilities.

scenarios.explanation_zh: T98 中間三連張，濕潤中間連接牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: T98 middle three connectors. Wet middle texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 987 中低連接，濕潤中間連接
scenarios.explanation_en: 987 connected middle cards. Wet middle connected.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 654 低牌三連張，濕潤低牌連接
scenarios.explanation_en: 654 low three connectors. Wet low connected.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 543 低牌連接，濕潤低牌牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: 543 low connected. Wet low texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 765 低中連接，濕潤低牌連接
scenarios.explanation_en: 765 low-middle connected. Wet low connected.

scenarios.explanation_zh: T73 全紅心，單花牌面，同花已可能完成
scenarios.explanation_en: T73 all hearts. Monotone texture, flush possible.

scenarios.explanation_zh: K84 全黑桃，單花牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: K84 all spades. Monotone board.

scenarios.explanation_zh: A95 全方塊，單花牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: A95 all diamonds. Monotone texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: Q92 全紅心，單花牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: Q92 all hearts. Monotone board.

scenarios.explanation_zh: A83 雙黑桃，A高斷開，雙花乾燥
scenarios.explanation_en: A83 two spades, ace-high disconnected. Two-tone dry.

scenarios.explanation_zh: K72 雙紅心，K高斷開，雙花乾燥
scenarios.explanation_en: K72 two hearts, king-high disconnected. Two-tone dry.

scenarios.explanation_zh: Q63 雙方塊，Q高斷開，雙花乾燥
scenarios.explanation_en: Q63 two diamonds, queen-high disconnected. Two-tone dry.

scenarios.explanation_zh: JT8 雙黑桃加連接，雙花濕潤
scenarios.explanation_en: JT8 two spades with connectivity. Two-tone wet.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 986 雙紅心加半連接，雙花濕潤
scenarios.explanation_en: 986 two hearts with semi-connectivity. Two-tone wet.

scenarios.explanation_zh: T97 雙方塊加連接，雙花濕潤
scenarios.explanation_en: T97 two diamonds with connectivity. Two-tone wet.

scenarios.explanation_zh: A92 彩虹A高斷開，乾燥A高
scenarios.explanation_en: A92 rainbow ace-high disconnected. Dry ace-high.

scenarios.explanation_zh: K62 彩虹K高斷開，乾燥K高
scenarios.explanation_en: K62 rainbow king-high disconnected. Dry king-high.

scenarios.explanation_zh: JJ4 配對J，高對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: JJ4 paired jacks. High paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 88K 配對8，低對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: 88K paired eights. Low paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: KJ9 大牌半連接，濕潤大牌牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: KJ9 broadway semi-connected. Wet broadway texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 875 中間半連接，濕潤中間連接
scenarios.explanation_en: 875 middle semi-connected. Wet middle texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 643 低牌半連接，濕潤低牌連接
scenarios.explanation_en: 643 low semi-connected. Wet low connected.

scenarios.explanation_zh: J52 全梅花，單花牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: J52 all clubs. Monotone texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 864 雙黑桃加半連接，雙花濕潤
scenarios.explanation_en: 864 two spades with semi-connectivity. Two-tone wet.

scenarios.explanation_zh: AT6 彩虹A高，輕微連接但仍屬乾燥A高
scenarios.explanation_en: AT6 rainbow ace-high. Minor connectivity but still dry ace-high.

scenarios.explanation_zh: KT7 彩虹K高，有間隙，乾燥K高
scenarios.explanation_en: KT7 rainbow king-high with gaps. Dry king-high.

scenarios.explanation_zh: Q95 彩虹Q高斷開，乾燥Q高
scenarios.explanation_en: Q95 rainbow queen-high disconnected. Dry queen-high.

scenarios.explanation_zh: T63 彩虹T高斷開，乾燥低牌彩虹
scenarios.explanation_en: T63 rainbow ten-high disconnected. Dry low rainbow.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 962 彩虹9高斷開，乾燥低牌彩虹
scenarios.explanation_en: 962 rainbow nine-high disconnected. Dry low rainbow.

scenarios.explanation_zh: AQT 大牌半連接，濕潤大牌牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: AQT broadway semi-connected. Wet broadway texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: J97 中間半連接，濕潤中間連接
scenarios.explanation_en: J97 middle semi-connected. Wet middle texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 753 低牌半連接，濕潤低牌連接
scenarios.explanation_en: 753 low semi-connected. Wet low connected.

scenarios.explanation_zh: K55 配對5，低對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: K55 paired fives. Low paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: AJJ 配對J，高對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: AJJ paired jacks. High paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: QT8 雙方塊加半連接，雙花濕潤
scenarios.explanation_en: QT8 two diamonds with semi-connectivity. Two-tone wet.

scenarios.explanation_zh: J85 雙梅花斷開，雙花乾燥
scenarios.explanation_en: J85 two clubs disconnected. Two-tone dry.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 932 雙紅心斷開，雙花乾燥
scenarios.explanation_en: 932 two hearts disconnected. Two-tone dry.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 876 完美三連張，非常濕潤的中間連接牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: 876 perfect three connectors. Very wet middle connected.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 432 最低三連張，濕潤低牌連接
scenarios.explanation_en: 432 lowest three connectors. Wet low connected.

scenarios.explanation_zh: AKJ 大牌半連接，濕潤大牌牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: AKJ broadway semi-connected. Wet broadway texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 662 配對6，低對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: 662 paired sixes. Low paired texture.

scenarios.explanation_zh: TTA 配對T（屬於低對子範疇），低對子牌面
scenarios.explanation_en: TTA paired tens. Low paired texture (tens classified as low pair).
